Workflow.Name: Lead (Update) - Move Dynamics 365 tab based on Parent Account field value
Workflow.Description: Flow that will manage the move of a Dynamics 365 tab to another Team channel on the update of a Lead depending on the value of the Parent Account field.

LocalizedName.description: Lead (Update) - Move Dynamics 365 tab based on Parent Account field value

Description.description: Flow that will manage the move of a Dynamics 365 tab to another Team channel on the update of a Lead depending on the value of the Parent Account field.
